pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create and Query a Local Copy of 'GenBank' in R // Download large sections of 'GenBank' https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/ and generate a local SQL-based database. A user can then query this database using 'restez' functions or through 'rentrez' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rentrez wrappers.
